title: I have no personal opinion on Morde because I never played him but...
body:
Anyone that has visited the bored lately can see that Riot has really really messed up. Consistent threads complaining about the rework. Multiple top threads complaining about the title change. Permanent pick/ban in Worlds and Solo Queue. Little to no complaining about the new champ release. Morde is so distracting that for the first time in the history of league there has been damnnear no complains about a new release. 

Riot, I don't care how much time and money you put into the rework. I don't care how hard you have worked to defend the rework. You have pissed off a champions entire playerbase and continue to do it. That is a HORRIBLE business practice. At this point I think you should apologize for the rework and start over. If you are so invested in a champion that is like what you are trying to turn Morde into then just make a new one and give the Morde players Morde back. At some point you need to admit that you are wrong.

Unfortuantely, most people are like you.

They form an opinion having never played Morde, with no intention of playing Mordekaiser.
With all the banning, most people probably don't even play AGAINST morde that much so...
So why should riot listen to that?

You don't need to play a champion in order to form an opinion. Just watch Worlds post juggernaut patch and you can form your own valid opinion. Play against him in ranked if he ever gets through, which happens,  and you can form an opinion. Read the +100 upvote morde main threads and form an opinion.

I watched worlds, I've played him in ranked and in normals, and I have opinions on him other than blind hatred, but most people dont want to hear that because they're too busy mourning a champion they never played and never intended to.

As far as forming an opinion based on thread upvotes, thats exactly the kind of "sheepish" mentality that I was talking about. A lot of people hate the new morde because a lot of people hate the new morde.

For instance, was morde banned in pro play because he is overpowered, or just far too outside the meta for pros to risk and/or adapt to?
Thats a discussion I wish I could find, instead of the endless morde hate circlejerk.

Let's put it this way, in Worlds at least in the matches I saw, if he wasn't banned he was picked and he dominated. He is incredibly powerful. 

I don't have a sheep mentality. I don't hate morde. I think he is not fun in any manner to play against but I don't hate him. I am simply saying that Riot wronged Morde's dedicated players and needs to fix it.

You need to change the thread title.
"I have no personal opinion" can never precede such an opinionated discussion. Lel.

I think the old morde was stupid af. He has a much more intelligent design now. Mind you, he's pretty stronk, but he's not exactly the only 'pretty stronk' champ at the moment

Old Morde was stupid in my opinion but new Morde can't be any better or healthier for the game. He either hits 3 Qs and wins or he doesn't and loses.  Also, even when pros play against him if Morde gets a dragon you will lose a tower to it. That is an incredibly unhealthy mechanic. 

Old Morde needs a rework. I won't argue that. But when almost all the people that mained him consistently lash out against the changes then they need to be reconsidered. And when the current rework feels worse than the old one then it needs to be seriously looked at.
